document_data.name: Threefold Boon
document_data.mainbody: '''''Threefold boon''''' was a [[divine]] [[alteration]] [[spell]] that increased the chances an individual was successful in their actions, for a brief period of time.
document_data.Effects: When this spell was cast, a single recipient gained a higher chance of success with their actions. The ''boon'' affected their combat prowess, their ability to perform skilled tasks and their resilience towards certain [[spell]]s, spell-like abilities, and other harmful effects.
document_data.History: The specifications of this spell appeared upon the ''[[Flame of the Spirit]]'' when it assumed its tablet form.
document_data.Components: This spell only required [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component]]s in order to be cast.
